column5: I use my Terrova to do alot of my slow trolling on Lake Erie. I am thinking of getting the copilot so I can keep the footpad up front out of the way. Anybody have any experience using the copilot good or bad?

I bought the unit last year for my boat,,,and all i can say about it,,is,,you gotta have one,,,so much easier and more accurate then the foot pedal,,,i love mine and havn't used my foot pedal since,,,,well worth the money!! :thumbsup_anim: Some toys are better then others!!

I can't comment on the MinnKota but I have the MotorGuide version and I wouldn't be without it.  I do however know a lot about MinnKota as they are a large customer of mine and if the MotorGuide unit hadn't come with my new boat I would have bought the MinnKota.
we have had one on are boat for 4 years or so now and love it
We have one on our boat... its awesome...
